name: peertube
description: PeerTube is a decentralized, federated video hosting platform based on ActivityPub. It supports streaming, playlists, federation, and custom instances, providing a self-hosted alternative to YouTube.
features: Federated video hosting: ActivityPub protocol enables federation with other PeerTube instances and Fediverse platforms for decentralized distribution
Video streaming: Adaptive bitrate streaming with multiple quality options ensures smooth playback across different connection speeds
Peer-to-peer delivery: WebTorrent technology distributes bandwidth load among viewers, reducing server costs for popular videos
Playlists and channels: Organize videos into playlists and channels for structured content presentation and easier discovery
Live streaming: Broadcast live video with chat integration and automatic VOD archiving after streams end
Video transcoding: Automatic conversion to multiple resolutions and formats ensures compatibility across devices and bandwidth conditions
Comments and moderation: Built-in commenting system with moderation tools to manage community interactions and filter spam
Privacy controls: Set videos as public, unlisted, or private with password protection and access restrictions
Plugin system: Extend functionality with plugins for themes, analytics, monetization, and custom features
Mobile apps: Companion apps for iOS and Android enable video watching and channel management on mobile devices
